pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dynamic Function-Oriented 'Make'-Like Declarative Pipelines // A pipeline toolkit for Statistics and data science in R, the 'targets' package brings function-oriented programming to 'Make'-like declarative pipelines. 'targets' orchestrates a pipeline as a graph of dependencies, skips steps that are already up to date, runs the necessary computation with optional parallel workers, abstracts files as R objects, and provides tangible evidence that the results are reproducible given the underlying code and data. The methodology in this package borrows from GNU 'Make' (2015, ISBN:978-9881443519) and 'drake' (2018, doi:10.21105/joss.00550).
